Question
========

A researcher notes that in her dataset with repeated measurements, the assumption of sphericity does not hold, and there is a lot of missing data.

So which technique is most appropriate? 
Answerlist
----------
* Multivariate ANOVA (MANOVA)
* Repeated measures ANOVA
* Covariance analysis (ANCOVA)
* Linear mixed model

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
